caller_intent: The caller wants to remove towing labor and rental car coverage from their insurance policy because they already have AAA and two cars, to save money.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the caller's identity using provided names and policy details.
Caller explained the request to remove towing labor and rental car coverage from a recent car endorsement.
Agent agreed to process the removal effective immediately.
Agent confirmed the change and noted the cost savings of $17/month.
summary: Customer requested removal of towing and rental car coverage from a new car endorsement, citing AAA coverage and dual vehicles. Agent confirmed the change would take effect immediately, resulting in $17/month savings. The customer expressed satisfaction with the adjustment.
